scripts.build: cd OHIFViewer && cross-env METEOR_PACKAGE_DIRS="../Packages" meteor build ../BUILD
scripts.builduntar: cd OHIFViewer && cross-env METEOR_PACKAGE_DIRS="../Packages" meteor build --directory ../BUILD
scripts.deploy: cd Build && tar -xzf OHIFViewer.tar.gz && cd bundle/programs/server && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.rundeployment: nohup sudo MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017 ROOT_URL=http://52.57.45.144 PORT=80 nodemon main.js &
scripts.mergeupstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/master
